mapper.select: select bl.bcode, bl.bname, bl.btype, c.ccode, c.cname, decode(bl.btype, 1, 'reboard', 2, 'board', 3, 'album', 'bbs') controller from board_list bl, category c where bl.ccode = c.ccode order by bl.bcode
select bname, cname, btype from board_list bl, category c where bl.ccode = c.ccode
